the cuisine was acceptable however the service we received was among the poorest ive ever encountered its possible that the server didnt appreciate our orders of only starters and brews but such behavior is unexpected at a dining establishment like this
seems like its marie callendars once more im thrilled i didnt miss the pies

true to its advertising this establishment presents topnotch quality without considering the expense intriguingly they have much lower prices than any other businesses featuring great quality products on the las vegas strip – hats off
